item.title: Against the grain: Spurious seeds and middlemen trigger debt crisis in Telangana's Gadwal; farmers lose land
item.description:
<![CDATA[Farmers demand action against seed companies & middlemen for losses
JOGULAMBA GADWAL: As if India's known reasons for farm distress of dependence on erratic rainfall, shrinking farm holdings, lack of organised credit and unexpected collapse in the prices were not enough, there is now an addition to the list - spurious and substandard seeds.Cottonseed farmers that TOI spoke to in Telangana's Jogulamba Gadwal district allege that middlemen are virtually triggering a debt crisis by first lendi...]]>
